commit message: Borders/Corners are now touch sensitive and allow the player to move around.
BUGFIX: Cast unknown zascii characters directly to unicode and hope for the best.
BUGFIX: more safety checks when turning the framebuffer into a string
BUGFIX: Removed trailing comma which defined a JSON null value where none was suppose to be.
Reverted 'Take' to 'Get' since it's a more versatile verb
Implemented save/restore opcode. It is now possible to save/restore from the commandline as well.
BUGFIX: a) don't throw a commandsave with the menusaves. They are different. b) make comamnd save work with z5 games.
Disabled save/restore command again as the opcode is suppose to work differently in z3 and z5.
